name: EmployeeTracker
description: As a business owner I want to be able to view and manage the departments, roles, and employees in my company So that I can organize and plan my business * Design the following database schema containing three tables: Employee, Role, Department. * Build a command-line application that at a minimum allows the user to: * Add departments, roles, employees * View departments, roles, employees * Update employee roles * Update employee managers * View employees by manager * Delete departments, roles, and employees * View the total utilized budget of a department -- ie the combined salaries of all employees in that department
